description: The date that the rodent was collected
The plot within which the rodent was collected (1,2,3,4,17 and 20)
Two letter abbreviation of the rodent species captured, left blank if indistinguishable
Sex of captured rodent, left blank if sex indistinguishable
Weight measurement of collected rodent, left blank if unmeasured
Status of scale used for weight measurement, left blank if calibrated, marked NC if not calibrated
